quote: What can you do to make your 10 year goals happen in 6 months?
Uncompromising on the vision, flexible with the details.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Be selfish the first half of your life, so you can be effectively charitable the second half
The wisest man has something yet to learn
If you can live your life without an audience. You should do it.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: It is amazing how much can be accomplished if no one cares who gets the credit.
author: John Wooden

quote: I have no right to say or do anything that diminishes a man in his own eyes. What matters is not what I think of him, but what he thinks of himself. Hurting a man in his dignity is a crime.
Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
author: Einstein

quote: The more pleasures a man captures, the more masters he will have to serve
For every subtle and complicated question, there is a perfectly simple and straightforward answer, which is wrong.
author: HL Mencken

quote: When setting out on a journey, do not seek the advice of those who never left home.
author: Rumi

quote: It does not matter how frequently something succeeds if failure is too costly to bear.
author: Nassim Taleb, Fooled by Randomness - page 10

quote: If you’ve got enough money to solve the problem, you don’t have a problem.
author: Dan Sullivan

quote: We are interested in others, when they are interested in us.
It is far harder to be kind than clever
You are not required to set yourself on fire to keep others warm
The best option is the option that creates more options
When you see a good move, look for a better one
I think everybody should get rich and famous and do everything they ever dreamed of so they can see that it's not the answer.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: It is better to remain silent, and be thought a fool, than to speak up and remove all doubt.
author: Lincoln

quote: If you gave me 6 hours to chop down a tree, I’d spend the first 4 sharpening the axe
author: Lincoln

quote: Perseverance is a great substitute for talent
author: Steve Martin

quote: I judge people by their own principles - not by my own.
author: Martin Luther King

quote: To the man with a hammer, the whole world looks like a nail - (don’t let your one discipline of expertise dictate your entire world view)
"The beauty of grace is that it makes life not fair." - Relient K, Be My Escape
“There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.”
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: We can only step from where we are standing
Ask yourself if you’ve earned the right to have an opinion
author: Ray Dalio

quote: The windshield is bigger than the rearview mirror for a reason
Weight opportunities from 1-10, but don’t use 7 - don’t settle for ‘just okay’ opportunities
An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
author: Buddha

quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase. Just take the first step.
author: MLK

quote: The last 10% of possible wins are better left to the idiots. – Andre Kostolany (on bubbles)
If everywhere you goes smells like shit, you’re probably the asshole.
Could the opposite of your story be true? (Seeing other perspectives)
He who is not contented with what he has, would not be contented with what he would like to have
author: Socrates

quote: Calm seas make not a good sailor
Silence is golden, eloquence is silver
The world rewards you for creating things it doesn’t know how to get for itself
When the gods wish to punish us, they answer our prayers
A step backward, after making a wrong turn, is a step in the right direction
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: The pressure of building a product that works can take your focus off a product that connects
The bitterness of low quality remains long after the sweetness of low price is forgotten
There’s no progress in comfort - Jason Humphrey
Be an encourager, the world has enough critics already
If you’re not prepared to be wrong, you’ll never come up with anything original.
author: Sir Ken Robinson

quote: A simple hello can could lead to a million things
A loose cannon eventually points your way

In times of change, learners inherit the earth, while the learned find themselves
beautifully equipped to deal with a world that no longer exists.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Worrying is like praying for something that you don’t want to happen
Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist - Picasso
Worrying does not take away tomorrow’s troubles. It takes away today’s peace
To guarantee success, act as if it were impossible to fail
The greater the artist, the greater the doubt. Perfect confidence is granted to the less talented as a consolation prize - Robert Hughes
I meet so many people who are in search of that one trick that will help them work smart. Even if you work smart, you still have to work hard. - Quincy Larson
There is no person living who isn’t capable of doing more than they think they can do - Henry Ford
You can never go wrong being on the right side of history - Bob Costas
The best gift I ever received was my father - Warren Buffett
The chains of habit are too light to be felt, until they’re too heavy to be broken
It takes 20 years to build a reputation and 5 minutes to lose it - Warren Buffett
There is no real excellence in all this world which can be separated from right living - David Start Jordan
If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves - Thomas Edison
To go fast, go alone. To go far, go together.
author: African Proverb

quote: Nothing is so fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.
author: William James

quote: Don’t let perfect be the enemy of good
No one can whistle a symphony…
author: H.E. Luccock

quote: The only time success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: I don’t have dreams. I have goals. Now it’s on the next one.
author: Harvey Specter

quote: It's not who you think you are that holds you back it's who you think you're not.
Don’t take criticism from people you wouldn’t take advice from
I’d rather be optimistic and wrong, than pessimistic and right
author: Elon Musk

quote: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom
author: Theodore Rubin

quote: Whenever you are confronted with an opponent, conquer them with love
author: Gandhi

quote: The best way out is always through
author: Robert Frost

quote: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people, and you can change it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
author: Mother Theresa

quote: When trying to cross a world of thorns, one can bulldoze, pave over it, and conquer it with force, or you can make sandals
author: paraphrased Buddhist saying

quote: This letter is so long because I did not have the time to make it short
author: Pascal

quote: I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: All code is garbage
author: TechLead

quote: Perfection is the enemy of progress
Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection
author: Mark Twain

quote: You cannot find peace by avoiding life
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: A goal should scare you a little, and excite you a lot
author: Joe Vitale

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself
author: Rumi

quote: You are very powerful, provided you know how powerful you are
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: Success is achieved by taking stairs while everyone else rides escalators- Me?
Today is the most important day of our lives
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: No matter how bad or slow things go, you're still way ahead of everyone who isn't even trying.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: This is the real secret to life—to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.
author: Alan Watts

quote: The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of non-essentials
author: Lin Yutang

quote: It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Your worst enemy cannot harm you as much as your own unguarded thoughts.
author: Buddha

quote: Everything that is important in life should be “opt out”. By default, you’re going to do these things: calling parents, working out, etc. it should be more rare to opt out then opt in
author: Ramit Sethi

quote: You are whatever you pretend to be
The standard pace is for chumps
author: Derek Sivers

quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: That which is most personal is most universal
“It is amateurs who have one big bright beautiful idea that they can never abandon. Professionals know that they have to produce theory after theory before they are likely to hit the jackpot.”
author: Francis Crick

quote: Share the gospel at all times. Use words when only absolutely necessary.
author: St. Augustin

quote: Adversity introduces a man to himself
Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
The measure of intelligence is the ability to change
A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
“There is real magic in enthusiasm. It spells the difference between mediocrity and accomplishment.”
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: It’s never too late to throw your life away,
author: Vamsi Varra

quote: Every original idea is first ridiculed, then vigorously attacked and finally taken fir granted
author: Schopenhauer

quote: Let go of the thoughts that don't make you strong.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t want to win an argument. You want to win
author: Nasim Taleb

quote: Never fail due to a lack of effort because effort requires no skill.
If I choose people and projects that matter to me, it does not matter how long it takes
author: Adam Grant

quote: Everything that happens once can never happen again. But everything that happens twice will surely happen a third time
author: the alchemist

quote: No matter what he does, every person on earth plays a central role in the history of the works. And normally he doesn’t know it
author: the alchemist

quote: History doesn’t repeat itself, but it rhymes
author: Mark Twain

quote: Faith requires doubt. It doesn’t require certainty...the opposite of faith is not doubt. It’s conviction. (Not sure what I want to take from this, but I like it)
author: Ken Burns

quote: How much pain has caused us the evils that have never happened
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Energy is the ultimate measure of fit. Is your environment giving energy, or taking it away?
author: the anatomy of self awareness

quote: Tough times don’t last. Tough people do
Aversion is the flip side of greed, the same desire from a different direction. — Stephen Mitchell paraphrasing Vicki Chang (Tao
A man with a watch knows what time it is. A man with two watches is never sure.
I work out for health, vanity, and sanity
author: Bob Iger

quote: Focusing on the upside is interesting, but counterproductive. You survive just fine if things go “too” well, not so for downside - paraphrasing Sam Zell on risk
Don’t ask a barber if you need a haircut
The most efficient way to meet interesting people is to become someone they already want to meet.
author: Julian Shapiro

quote: The brain is no place for serious thinking. If you're thinking about something important and complicated, write it down.
author: Jack Altman

quote: Best practices are often suboptimal
author: Julian Shapiro

quote: You get further in life by avoiding repeated stupidity than you do by striving for maximum intelligence.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: Your entire life runs on the software—the models—in your head. Why wouldn’t you obsess over optimizing it?
author: Tim Urban

quote: When you view the world as a series of outputs, you form opinions. But when you view the world as a series of systems, you form strategies.
author: Channing Allen

quote: Using an exclamation mark is like laughing at your own joke.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: There seems to be some perverse human characteristic that likes to make easy things difficult.
author: Buffett

quote: Man is disturbed not by things, but by the views he takes of them.
author: Epictetus

quote: If a person doesn’t know to which port they sail, no wind is favourable.
author: Seneca

quote: Throw out your conceited opinions, for it is impossible for a person to begin to learn what he thinks he already knows.
author: Epictetus

quote: No man was ever wise by chance
author: Seneca

quote: Any fool can learn by experience. I prefer to learn from the experiences of others.
author: Bismarck

quote: Inspiration is for amateurs. The rest of us just show up and get to work.
author: Chuck Close

quote: Many a false step was made by standing still
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action

I am an old man and have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened.
—MARK TWAIN
Americans will always do the right thing, only after they have tried everything else." - Winston Churchill
Never interrupt the enemy when they are making a mistake.
author: Napoleon

quote: Avoiding stupidity is easier than seeking brilliance
It’s the strong swimmers who drown
Let go of the thoughts that don’t make you strong
I quickly dismissed these thoughts. I was a computer, and no amount of self-reflection would change that fact.
author: GPT-3

quote: Occasionally successful investing requires inactivity
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If you can’t tell whose side someone is on, they are not on yours
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Use only that which works, and take it from any place you can find it.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there
author: Teddy Roosevelt

quote: Life shrinks and expands in proportion with our courage
Trust, but verify
It is better for a man to go wrong in freedom than to go right in chains
It isn’t enough to think outside the box. Thinking is passive. Get used to acting outside the box.
It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Less impressed. More involved
author: Matthew

quote: Verb is the holy word
author: Matt Mconaghrt

quote: It’s easier to macro-bullshit than to micro-bullshit
Science is the belief in the ignorance of experts
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Not wanting it is as good as having it
Most of life is a search for who and what needs you the most.
author: Naval

quote: Even a blind squirrel finds a nut sometimes
Read what you love until you love to read
author: Naval?

quote: There’s no such thing as writer’s block. There’s only the fear of bad writing
author: Seth Godin

quote: Doing what you love is for amateurs. Professionals love what they do.
author: Seth godin

quote: Creativity is a generous act
author: Seth Godin

quote: The culture is created by all of us. It might feel as though it’s done to us, but it’s also created by us.
author: Seth Godin

quote: The smartest person in the room is the person class learn how to tap in to the intelligence of everyone in the room
“You are not entitled to your opinion. You are entitled to your informed opinion. No one is entitled to be ignorant.”
author: Harlan Ellison

quote: A friend to all is a friend to none
author: Aristotle

quote: "Nothing is enough for the man to whom enough is too little."
author: Epicurus

quote: Some people are born into families that encourage education; others are against it. Some are born into flourishing economies encouraging of entrepreneurship; others are born into war and destitution. I want you to be successful, and I want you to earn it. But realize that not all success is due to hard work, and not all poverty is due to laziness. Keep this in mind when judging people, including yourself.
“For reasons I have never understood, people like to hear that the world is going to hell.”
author: Deirdre McCloskey

quote: Physicist Albert Bartlett put it: “The greatest shortcoming of the human race is our inability to understand the exponential function.”
author: Albert Bartlett

quote: Ben Graham once said, “The purpose of the margin of safety is to render the forecast unnecessary.”
author: Ben Graham

quote: Anything that can’t go on forever will end
author: Herb Stein

quote: If you don’t have the courage to commit a crime, doesn’t mean you’re moral for not doing it. Just means you’re afraid. (Obedience is not morality, essentially)
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: When you’re right, that’s what you get to be: right.
Reflect upon your present blessings -- of which every man has many -- not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.”
author: Charles Dickens

quote: In the end, winning is sleeping well
There are many [awe-inspiring] wonders, none greater than a human being.
author: Sophocles, Chorus in Antigone

quote: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Focus on being interested, not interesting
The truth needs no defense
Never let anyone rob the joy of the process

It's not that I'm so smart. It's just that I stay with problems longer." 
—Albert Einstein
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A person is smart. People are dumb
author: Tommy Lee Jones as Agent K in Men in Black

quote: If you only wished to be happy, this could be easily accomplished; but we wish to be happier than other people, and this is always difficult, for we believe others to be happier than they are.
If the direction is correct, sooner or later you will get there. - Chinese proverb
author: Chinese proverb

quote: Sometimes magic is just someone spending more time on something than anyone else might reasonably expect.”
author: Raymond Joseph Teller

quote: Praise specifically. Criticize generally.
author: Buffett

quote: Pointing out obvious exceptions implies either the target isn’t smart or you aren’t.
author: Naval

quote: Don’t take yourself so seriously. You’re just a monkey with a plan.
author: Naval

quote: Happiness is there when you remove the sense of something missing in your life.
author: Naval

quote: Writing is often the process by which you realize that you do not understand what you are talking about.
Better to miss a zillion opportunities than blow up once.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: What looks like success is often just patience.
A rich person wants many things. A sick person only wants one.
It’s far more profitable to sell advice than to take it - Steve Forbes
author: Steve Forbes

quote: The only uncrowded market is Great - Tim Ferris
author: Tim Ferris

quote: Everything you want is on the other side of fear
Always remember that to argue, and win, is to break down the reality of the person you are arguing against. It is painful to lose your reality, so be kind, even if you are right.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Rich people have money. Wealthy people have time. (Me?)
Truth is like poetry. And most people fucking hate poetry.
Never underestimate the gullibility of large pools of money.
Only foolish investors pursue casual attempts to beat the market, as such casual attempts provide the fodder for the skilled investors’ market-beating results.”
I believe that the greatest teachers create thinking students.
author: David Swensen

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Paper is more patient than people
author: Anne Frank

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: Anais Nin

quote: The most important step in becoming successful in anything is to first become interested in it.
author: Sir William Osler

quote: Be who you needed when you were younger.
author: T.S. Elliot

quote: Mood follows action
In the most dysfunctional organizations, signaling that work is being done becomes a better strategy for career advancement than actually doing work.
author: Peter Thiel

quote: Patience is not passive, on the contrary, it is concentrated strength.” ― Bruce Lee
What appears to be luck is often preparation and patience.
Mastering your circumstances starts with being ready
In a heart filled with gratitude, there’s no room for discontentment
My friend Brent has a theory about marriage: It only works when both people want to help their spouse while expecting nothing in return. If you both do that, you’re both pleasantly surprised.
If you want to build a ship, don’t drum up people to gather wood, divide the work and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.’
Life is long if you know how to use it. - Seneca
Make friends with the eminent dead - Munger
Many people die at 25, but aren't buried until 75.
To die rich is to die disgraced. - Andrew Carnegie

I cannot think of a more personally rewarding and appropriate use of wealth than to give while one is living—to personally devote oneself to meaningful efforts to improve the human condition." - Chuck Feeney
The cure to boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: Truth rests with the minority…because the minority is generally formed by those who really have an opinion
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: We must be able, at any time, to accept the fact that we could all be absolutely and utterly wrong
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Every dollar you spend is a vote for what you value in life.
author: Anonymous

quote: They laugh at me because I'm different; I laugh at them because they're all the same.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: A military force has no constant formation, water has no constant shape: the ability to gain victory by changing and adapting according to the opponent is called genius.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existence.
author: Einstein

quote: The greatest strength is in the courage to start again
Everything offers a finite opportunity to savor your life
author: Sam Harris

quote: Attention is your true source of wealth, even more than time
author: Sam Harris

quote: The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: The reason Roger (Federer) is so interesting is because he’s so interested
When you notice that you’re having negative thoughts about how all of this is going to pan out, you need to remind yourself that you are not a very good fortune teller.
author: Donna W. Hill

quote: If your expectations grow faster than your income you’ll never be happy with your money no matter how much you accumulate.
author: Morgan Housel

quote: More fiction has been written in Excel than Word.
It’s nice to be important but more important to be nice
Aim above morality. Be not simply good, be good for something.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Anyone that’s ever made a lot of money, didn’t make it fast
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: Keep the schedule. Reduce the scope. (When failing to keep commitments - diet, meditation, etc)
I have to write to discover what I am doing
author: Flannery O’Connor

quote: The purpose of life is to experience things for which you will later experience nostalgia.
Jokes of the proper kind, properly told, can do more to enlighten questions of politics, philosophy, and literature than any number of dull arguments.
author: Isaac Asimo

quote: Thousands of people don’t like what I do. Fortunately, millions do.
author: James Patterson

quote: The object isn’t to make art, it’s to be in that wonderful state that makes art inevitable.
author: Robert Henri

quote: Technology is a useful servant, but a dangerous master.
In life, you will experience pain - the pain of discipline, or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.
Doubt can only be removed by action
